content.html: Unless you’re a founder of a company (and sometimes even if you are) please know that you’re very much expendable. Work long hours, nights and weekends if you’re personally motivated, but please don’t do so because of what others tweet. They have wildly different incentives.
content.value:
Unless you’re a founder of a company (and sometimes even if you are) please know that you’re very much expendable.

Work long hours, nights and weekends if you’re personally motivated, but please don’t do so because of what others tweet. They have wildly different incentives.
